name: Ultimate Online Course | Notion Template
description: Save time making your next online course. Keep all your assets, scripts and your team organised. It's Everything you need to go from course idea to upload on a platform or website.How to use this:After checkout, you'll be redirected to a Notion page. Click 'Duplicate' in the top right of the page and get going! Plan: Choose your class topic, audience and outline your video lessons.Produce: Bring your ideas to life using the production process.Publish: Upload your video lessons to your website or
